name: Jonathan - Trick or Treat 48K
description:
A game for the ZX Spectrum 48K

 by  Team Moritz!

"It's Halloween night and strange things are happening.
Jonathan has been transformed into a shadowly, ghostly head and transported into his own game world. He must float and bounce around collecting enough treats to rescue Egghead, who has been imprisoned. Avoiding the other ghostly figures as too much contact will increase the trick level until it's game over. Once enough treats have been collected he will be directed back to Egghead to release his old friend.

Happy Halloween!!!!!"

Game design: Seb
Sprites and Loading Screen: Lobo
Blocks: Mananuk
Sound: Tufty
Fonts: Damian Guard

AGD engine: Jonathan Cauldwell
Sprite magic: Allan Turvey

Tubular Beeps by Mike Oldfield

Keyboard:

  • Q: Left  
  • W: Right     
  • Space: Jump 
  • M: Toggle music on/off

Joystick: Cursor/Kempston
